akas: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (original title)
The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation USA (complete title)
akas from release info: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (original title)
The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation USA (complete title)

1.title: Flyboard Air

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The jet hover board that flies over 100 mph as high as 9,000 feet. 3D printed homes built in a day. The new food made from pond scum. And, when the world transitioned from horses to cars.

2.title: Spinach Leaf Hearts

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: How science is transforming spinach leafs into new heart tissue. Deterring burglars with a fog security system. Turning cement pipes into compact housing. And, when U.S. automakers became wartime plane makers.

3.title: Paper Sculptures

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The innovative artist turning folded paper into unbelievable sculpture. The company Turing used shipping containers into indoor farms. New discovery to grow crops in deserts. And, the historic home where the Wright Brothers grew up.

4.title: Geometric Pies

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: Saving homes from floods with an inner-tube like system. The artistic baker using math to create her artistic pies. French app maker keeping travelers safe by warning of high crime areas to avoid. And, the history of Ham Radios keeping the world connected.

5.title: Sunray Art

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The bright artist using the sun's rays to make an imprint on the world. The teens creating techie tents for the homeless. The handheld device saving lives by detecting peanuts and gluten in foods. And, the task of moving historic structures to Detroit to keep for posterity.

6.title: Africa's Blood Drone

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The start-up using drones to deliver life saving blood to hard to reach villages in Africa. The bed fan that's a hot leg fan. 3D printed bicycle tires that never go flat. And, how the typewriter changed the history of communication.

7.title: Young Car Designer

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The 24 year-old woman designing the cars of our future. The man who created the standing desk. The fruit picking robot that could change the future of produce. And, the evolution of the printing press.

8.title: Hydrofoil Surfboard

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The creator of the Jetfoil Surfboard that rides high above the waves. The device pointing the way to friends lost in crowds or wilderness. The weeding robot keeping gardens growing their best. And, the importance of the train caboose, bringing up the rear.

9.title: Skylight Balcony

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The inventor of the Pop Sockets handle for your phone. We went to Denmark to see the skylight that turns into a balcony. The suitcase that doubles as a travel stroller. And, the evolution of the bicycle.

10.title: Fishing Cannon

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The fishing cannon that fires your hook and bait hundreds of feet into the water. Fighting droughts with rainwater cisterns. Self healing glass. And, how tractors changed the farming world.

11.title: Inside Out Helmet

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The soft on the outside football helmet that's changing the game of safety. The earbuds that focus on listening to who's in front of you. How 3D printing is building bridges. And, how a museum keeps track of, and decides what to display.

12.title: Fog Security

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: Deterring burglars with a fog security system. The jet hover-board that flies over 100 mph as high as 9,000 feet. New discovery to grow crops in deserts. And, the history of Ham Radios keeping the world connected.

14.title: Robot Whisperer

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: A woman who tames robots; keeping phones clean with a box of light; a headlight that describes sight for the blind; the history of refrigerators.

1.title: Microscopic Windmills

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us teen inventors who are out to stop distracted driving; how Thomas Edison's inventions still make us all look like slackers; that the drone invasion is upon us; and how windmills the size of a flea could revolutionize electric power.

2.title: Medical MacGyver

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Voice Magic of Autotune

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the creator of the pop singer's best friend, Auto/Tune; in other segments we learn about Rosa Parks and the bus that changed the world of race relations; how humanoid robots are making it into the mainstream; and see how we can skim the plastics from our oceans.

4.title: Algae Girl

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows a girl who is pioneering oil/producing algae by growing it under her bed; we look at the Wright brothers building the first plane; innovations in pet tech; and a 3D printing pen.

5.title: Hollow Flashlight Girl

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us a teen who invented a battery/free flashlight; how we can diagnose million/dollar violins with CAT scans; cloth that generates electricity; and asks the question / Is payment technology making wallets extinct?

6.title: Aging Software

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us how software that can accurately age any facial picture up to that of an 80 year/old; in other segments we see a futuristic portable home of the past; emergency tech - how to stay in touch when the power goes out; and how actress Hedy Lamarr changed our wireless world.

7.title: Nano Clothes

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us how nanotechnology could make dirty clothes a thing of the past; how food packaging has changed how we shop; and in other segments we see innovations that are taking the frustration out of finding that parking space; inventions to make sure you never lose your keys again.

8.title: 3D Printed Food

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us that soon you may be able to print your pancakes! In other segments we learn about Igor Sikorsky, the father of the helicopter; recording sound off of leaves; and how you may never lose anything again.

9.title: Armband Mouse

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us inventors who are making any car a self/drive vehicle; in other segments we learn that Henry Ford was also the father of soybeans; we meet the inventors of the armband computer mouse; and see how floating wind turbines capture the high/altitude winds.

10.title: Facial Recognition and Shopping

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us how stores use facial recognition software to target big/ticket shoppers; in other segments we look at the legacy of Abraham Lincoln; how jock tech is changing the way we exercise; and we meet the young Irishman who created a sports mouth guard to detect concussions.

11.title: Salmon Canon

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the invention that shoots spawning salmon over man/made obstructions as they swim upstream; we visit the Noah Webster Home, where the first American dictionary was written; and we meet the inventor of a soccer ball that generates plug/in power.

12.title: Best Of: Innovation

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Electric Paint

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the biker dudes who've invented elaborate paint that lights up; in other segments we learn about the return of wrinkled sheep; the inventor of the Elio 3/wheeled car; and the teen who invented a way to clean water with water.

14.title: Solar Roadways

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us an innovator who condensed a TV satellite truck into a backpack; how the Model T car assembly line changed the manufacturing world; the inventors of solar roads that could power the world; and lifelike robot predatory birds to lessen the dangers of real birds at airports.

15.title: Snake Robots

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the man who invented the digital camera; the fascinating history of the presidential limousine, including the one used by President Kennedy; the inventors of the snake robot that can save people in disasters; and the inventors of clear solar panels that look like glass.

16.title: Wrist Air Conditioner

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the inventor of an app to monitor your sleep and health; we learn about unique trains throughout history; the inventors of a watch/like device that cools your entire body like an air conditioner; and the three Irish girls speeding up how seeds grow.

17.title: Pocket Printer

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the hardware store robot; the incredible patent models from Thomas Edison that show us the beginning of our electronic world; the Israeli inventors of a printer that fits in your pocket.

18.title: Liter of Light

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the inventors of the armband computer mouse; we learn about Rosa Parks and the bus that changed the world of race relations; and that soon you may be able to print your pancakes; and how to light the world with soda bottles.

19.title: Inventor of Email

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the inventor of a fireproof gel that is helping firefighters save lives; historic steam engines that are the grandfathers of electricity; a camera that follows you so you're always in frame; and we meet the man who, at 14 years old, invented the email system we use today.

20.title: Penguin Chick Bot

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the students who built a car that gets 2700 MPG; the beginning of the computer age with one of the original Apple Computers; the inventors of the highest tech suitcase; and the Penguin Chick Bot that is giving researchers a new view into the penguin world.

21.title: Science Restaurant

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

22.title: Robotic Birds

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the creator of the pop singer's best friend, Autotune; The Henry Ford and the return of wrinkled sheep; the invention that shoots spawning salmon over obstructions as they swim upstream; and lifelike robot predatory birds to lessen the dangers of real birds at airports.

23.title: Shiver Shield

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

23.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

24.title: Chairless Chair

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us an electric bike wheel to power your ride; a restaurant serving a 100/year/old menu; the wonders of the world's highest tech sports stadium located in Silicon Valley; and the inventors of the Chairless Chair.

25.title: Tiny Homes

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

25.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the innovative designs of the tiniest homes; the historic fashion of the Queen of Tires; the inventor of the phone in your pocket; and words of wisdom from the inventors we've profiled to the innovators of tomorrow.

26.title: Electric Soccer Ball

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us the inventor of a soccer ball that generates plug/in power; Igor Sikorsky, the father of the helicopter; saving lives with Snake Robots; and the Penguin Chick Bot that is giving researchers a new view into the penguin world.

1.title: Wolves of Yellowstone

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: How returning wolves to Yellowstone National Park changed nature. Vine's Six Second Spielberg, Zach King. The rivalry between Nikola Tesla and Thomas Edison. And the new Bee Hive that makes the honey flow.

2.title: Horse Play

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The coolest toy for horses. Teaching the science of gravity with bowling balls. Making plastic from banana peels. And how weaving techniques led to computer programming.

3.title: Shark Repellent

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: What device is keeping sharks away from swimmers. The video doorbell connected to your smartphone. The history of the DC/3 airliner. And the coating for plastic bottles that gets the last drop.

4.title: Stone Balance Art

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The physics involved with the art of Stone Balancing. Farmers saving water with the Tree TeePee. The history of turning the family farm into a business. And the chemistry behind the polymers we use every day.

5.title: Tallest Roller Coaster

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The physics behind the tallest roller coaster. Making Make/up at home with the inventor of the 3D Make/up Printer. Historic Arcade and Video Games. And the headlights for your running shoes.

6.title: Car Eye Monitor

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The car dashboard that makes sure you're paying attention. The softest speakers putting you to sleep. The light making your video chats glow. And history's greatest innovators go camping!?

7.title: Football Field Lines

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The TV magic behind the first down lines on football telecasts. The App Camp for Girls. The history behind windmill innovations. And putting out fires with sound waves.

8.title: Baby Tech

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Tech for keeping tabs on toddlers; rebuilt billfold; the history behind Lunch Wagon and mobile food; source of new colors using pigments.

9.title: Hoverboard

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The innovator who has created a Hover Board. The push to have kids learn computer code in school. The man who brought us Super Bananas to ward off disease. The history of Steam Engines in manufacturing.

10.title: 3D Printed Clothes

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: How you may be able to someday print your clothes. The panic button app giving you protection in the palm of your hand. The history of the Tri/Motor Airplane.

11.title: Jetman

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The inventor soaring to new heights with a jet on his back. New innovation putting and end to police chases. The Drinkable Book that filters dirty water. The art and science of restoring museum artifacts.

12.title: Pendulum Wave

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: Teaching the science of gravity with bowling balls. The physics involved with the art of Stone Balancing. The rivalry between Nikola Tesla and Thomas Edison. And the new Bee Hive that makes the honey flow.

13.title: Slip N Fly

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Host Mo Rocca shows us: The physics behind the an extreme slip and slide. How inventors use crowdfunding to bring their ideas to the world. The stealth invention of the V/8 engine. Updates of some favorite innovators profiled on Innovation Nation.

14.title: Lung Growing

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: A story about scientists growing human lungs in a laboratory. Also: a history lesson on farm equipment; and the invention of an extremely useful pizza box.

episode of.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation (TV Series 2014– )

25.title: Artificial Arm Inventor

locations: The Henry Ford Museum, Dearborn, Michigan, USA
imdb.plot outline: INNOVATION NATION, hosted by Mo Rocca of CBS SUNDAY MORNING, is a Daytime Emmy Award-winning celebration of the inventor's spirit - from historic scientific PIONEERS throughout past centuries to the forward-looking visionaries of today. Each episode tells the dramatic stories behind the world's greatest inventions - and the perseverance, passion and price required to bring them to life. Featuring "MoCabulary" where bigger words used in the episode are defined; "The Mo You Know" quizzes about current and past inventions; And a "Hologram Screen" that allows Mo Rocca to connect with innovators all over the world. This series appeals to young viewers and their families. INNOVATION NATION received Daytime Emmy Awards for Outstanding Writing Special Class in 2016, and for Outstanding Special Class Series in 2015.
imdb.title: The Henry Ford's Innovation Nation
plot: Host 'Mo Rocca' (qv) shares the dramatic stories of extraordinary investors in hopes of inspiring viewers to open their imaginations and bring their visions to life.::Jwelch5742

INNOVATION NATION, hosted by 'Mo Rocca' (qv) of CBS SUNDAY MORNING, is a Daytime Emmy Award-winning celebration of the inventor's spirit - from historic scientific PIONEERS throughout past centuries to the forward-looking visionaries of today. Each episode tells the dramatic stories behind the world's greatest inventions - and the perseverance, passion and price required to bring them to life. Featuring "MoCabulary" where bigger words used in the episode are defined; "The Mo You Know" quizzes about current and past inventions; And a "Hologram Screen" that allows 'Mo Rocca' (qv) to connect with innovators all over the world. This series appeals to young viewers and their families. INNOVATION NATION received Daytime Emmy _Awards_ (qv) for Outstanding Writing Special Class in 2016, and for Outstanding Special Class Series in 2015.
